attributes.additional_details:
I propose the summer holidays in the UK to be evenly split into 2 shorter holidays so its fairer on kids and fairer on parents and teaching staff alike.

I further propose a staggering of holidays in the UK  so its fairer on kids and fairer on parents and teaching staff alike.

The current system just does not work. We can't have a perfect system to suit everyone but we can have a better more efficient system in place so please back these two proposals and we can at least be heard by our local MPs and hopefully within parliament itself.

Thanks

Jim Deeney
